blogPost.excerpt: bilgge is a free service which makes you feel as if you were storing data in a real safe house. instead of saying "it uses end-to-end encryption" then asking you 8+ characters password to protect your data, it gives you power to encrypt your data by yourself in your browser.
blogPost.body: bilgge is a free service which makes you feel as if you were storing data in a real safe house. instead of saying "it uses end-to-end encryption" then asking you 8+ characters password to protect your data, it gives you power to encrypt your data by yourself in your browser.

previous.excerpt: Clockk is a FREE AI-powered time tracking tool for digital agencies and freelancers. See what you worked on, when, by project. No more time sheet pain! Perfect for software devs, graphic designers, digital marketers, and anyone else who bills time. 🔥💰🚀
previous.title: Clockk 2.0 - AI-powered time tracking for agencies and freelancers

localize.description: Clockk是一款免费的人工智能时间追踪工具，适用于数字机构和自由职业者。按项目查看您的工作内容、时间。不再有时间表的痛苦 非常适合软件开发人员、平面设计师、数字营销人员以及其他任何需要记录时间的人。🔥💰🚀
localize.tagline: 为机构和自由职业者提供人工智能驱动的时间跟踪服务

localize.description: Clockk是一款免費的人工智能時間追蹤工具，適用於數字機構和自由職業者。按項目查看您的工作內容、時間。不再有時間表的痛苦 非常適合軟件開發人員、平面設計師、數字營銷人員以及其他任何需要記錄時間的人。🔥💰🚀
localize.tagline: 爲機構和自由職業者提供人工智能驅動的時間跟蹤服務

next.excerpt: omniquotient is an assessment tool that helps you learn if you are using the tech community's recommended practices in programming, and if not, it shows you how you can improve the way you code.
next.title: omniquotient - Assess and grow your knowledge as a developer

localize.description: omniquotient是一个评估工具，它可以帮助你了解你是否在编程中使用了技术社区推荐的实践，如果没有，它就会告诉你如何改进你的编码方式。
localize.tagline: 评估并增长您作为开发人员的知识

localize.description: omniquotient是一個評估工具，它可以幫助你瞭解你是否在編程中使用了技術社區推薦的實踐，如果沒有，它就會告訴你如何改進你的編碼方式。
localize.tagline: 評估並增長您作爲開發人員的知識
